goal.ch:
熟悉天文領域的期刊
期刊閱讀與寫作技巧
goal.en: Learning how to read and write scientific articles, particularly for journals in astronomy and astrophysics.

outline.ch: This is a workshop course, in which you will learn and practice to write journal papers.  You will be exposed to variety of tools (and good habits) to help organize your essay.  While the guidelines are for effective writing to present scientific work in general, specifics will be given for astronomy or astrophysical journals.  A good command of language (English) is a prerequisite.  This is therefore not a language course.  Expect excessive writing.
